name: Mahjong Magic Journey 2 Free
description:
Travel through a fantasy kingdom! Visit the magical Crystal Cave. Have fun relaxing in the Air Harbor and don't freeze in the Frozen Desert.

Complete games of Mahjong to suit any taste.
Classical levels, themed levels, super fast levels for points when you need to save time, high levels of 15 layers for when you want to put your brain into high gear, and huge 200 tile levels for long journeys!

Enjoy more than seven hours of gameplay in 120 unique levels in six fantastic and unexplored worlds, with spellbinding views of the game's magical universe.
Each level has special tasks and special golden tiles.
